Name: Ginger Margarita
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare skewered crystallised ginger for garnish.
Review: Ginger liqueur replaces orange liqueur in this lightly spicy margarita.
Nutrition: One serving of Ginger Margarita contains 186 calories
